that guy does some whacked out illusions doesnt he ?? or is it just illusions ? emoticon_confused
I want to know how he walks up wall, or goes through solid glass, or disappears, or... you know what? I'd like to know how he does any of it.

Yeah, did you see the one where he had a woman lay down on a picnic table and then he sawed her in half ? He laid this woman down, then had another woman pull on her arms, while another woman pulled on her legs, then he cut the woman in half by just sawing on her midsection with his fingers. She went screaming across the yard with only her two arms pulling her upper torso and her waist and legs were left behind still kicking, on the picnic table. He also performed the act on himself using a huge rotating circular saw blade that cut him in half . No blood and guts were shown though from those events .. 
 
 And that ole' "making the elephant disappear behind the walls of cloth " he does in the middle of the parking lot is a good one too. The hispanics after seeing his tricks performed right in front of them, call Chriss the "diablo". I know these tricks we are seeing this guy do is not really what  we are seeing  , but it would be neat to know how he creates those illusions. It is interesting to watch the reactions on the faces of those standing around this guy , when he does his trickery. :)

 I like his stuff, too, but I need to see Chris Angel do something live before I could even begin to fathom how good an illusionist he really is. Watching this stuff on TV -- even some of the card tricks -- cant convince me of his talent. It doesnt matter how real it looks, because I'm alwasy making the assumption that it must be trick photography and, of course, staged actors. If I could at least be one of those up close observers, THEN I'd be WOWed!!!

 ahhh dont be stupid...
 its fake...
 
 all of it...
 fake

Well, define "fake" an illusion is something that isnt real "magic" but "appears" to be, something that is twisted to look "real" even though it isnt, so wouldnt that be considered "fake" still? "fake" magic? 
 I could care less whats an illusion and what he really truly does with his mind, he has an audience and he has my attention, real or "fake" its all in good fun, right?
his show is dumb one whole episode was about how a car is going to run him over while he's on some nails. sounded exciting at first but like 30 minutes later was kinda boring.

Hey, you know him too? Nobody in England does but me...
 Anyway, he ROCKS!
